lexUnit.name: shocked.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: characterized by being struck with a big and very unexpected surprise

sentence.text: Where I live now , the landlady was visibly shocked when she heard that our home had been " house-jacked .
I was really shocked by what he did , " she said .
